nodes.name: isPaused

nodes.documentation:
Returns deadline passed status
 @return boolean of whether or not the gameweek deadline has passed
nodes.name: viewDeadlineStatus

nodes.documentation:
Allows the admin to pause certain contract functions to be called in case of emergency
 Functions paused in emergency are: createGame, joinGame, commitTeam, and revealTeam
nodes.name: toggleContractPause

nodes.documentation:
Updates the live gameweek
 @param _deadline time epoch of the live gameweek

nodes.documentation:
Queries the current time (GMT+1) using Provable
 @dev should be called by admin when the gameweek deadline has passed
nodes.name: toggleDeadlinePassed

nodes.documentation:
Handles ProvableAPI call response
 @dev sets the 'deadlinePassed' variable to true if the current time exceeds the gameweek deadline.

nodes.name: __callback

__callback(bytes32,string).details: sets the 'deadlinePassed' variable to true if the current time exceeds the gameweek deadline.

params._deadline: time epoch of the live gameweek

isPaused().return: boolean of whether or not the contract is currently paused

toggleDeadlinePassed().details: should be called by admin when the gameweek deadline has passed

viewDeadlineStatus().return: boolean of whether or not the gameweek deadline has passed

isPaused().notice: Returns the pause status of the contract

toggleContractPause().notice: Allows the admin to pause certain contract functions to be called in case of emergency Functions paused in emergency are: createGame, joinGame, commitTeam, and revealTeam

toggleDeadlinePassed().notice: Queries the current time (GMT+1) using Provable
